description:
While hiking, Kogoro, Conan, and Ran hear the moaning voice of the Tengu. After staying the night at a guest house at the bottom of the mountain, the next morning they decide to visit the Tengu`s Cave, one of the town`s historic sites. Inside the cave Conan discovers a body wearing a tengu mask hanging from the Tengu`s shrine. The body belongs to mayor Mayama. Mayama was being blackmailed by someone over the undocumented contributions he received during the election. Kogoro determines the death is a suicide based on the absence of anyone else in the cave, but Conan feels there`s something off about the body and crime scene...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: You Can Hear the Tengu`s Voice
